thread.title: Soap spoilers: Steph Scully returns in Neighbours, Zac and Leah break up in Home and Away - Neighbours Soaps -
thread.title_full: Soap spoilers: Steph Scully returns in Neighbours, Zac and Leah break up in Home and Away - Neighbours News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Sophie Dainty
title: Soap spoilers: Steph Scully returns in Neighbours, Zac and Leah break up in Home and Away - Neighbours Soaps -
text: Neighbours fans will see Steph Scully return to screens later this month, but it will come as no surprise that her return is far from straightforward.The troubled mechanic turns up in Erinsborough unexpectedly to apply for a job at the garage, but doesn't reveal her ties to the area as she is interviewed by Tyler Brennan.With Tyler blown away by Steph's mechanic skills, he soon finds himself offering her a permanent job. However, Steph's happiness is short-lived when Karl turns up to get help with his bike and spots her. © Channel 5Steph is back Although Steph decides to face the music by greeting Karl properly, he can't help but feel concerned about her arrival despite her insistence that she's progressing well.Steph later reconnects with her old friend Toadie and explains that she just wants to rebuild her life, but her hopes come crashing down when Tyler reveals that Lucas doesn't want her working at the garage.To make matters worse, Lucas is currently on his way to Ramsay Street to confront her face-to-face. Will Steph ever be able to put the past behind her? © Channel 5Karl gets a shock when he sees Steph © Channel 5Steph decides to greet Karl openly and not hide © Channel 5Karl has concerns over Steph's return Neighbours airs these scenes on Monday, October 19 and Tuesday, October 20 at 1.45pm and 5.30pm on Channel 5.Neighbours star Carla Bonner is returning as Steph ScullyNeighbours to introduce female love interest for Steph ScullyNeighbours' Steph Scully to face a tough time on return: 'She wants to redeem herself'New Neighbours promo teases the trouble in store for Steph Scully on her returnNeighbours spoilers: Steph Scully's return angers Sonya and Lucas in new trailerAlso ahead on Ramsay Street, there is more heartache for Terese Willis as she realises that she has lost her husband Brad for good.With Brad and Lauren keen to make their relationship official, Terese (Rebekah Elmaloglou) finds herself struggling to cope with her emotions and is further hurt to learn that her ex is moving into the Turner house permanently.When Lauren and Brad later arrive at Harold's to find it trashed, it doesn't take Lauren long to point the finger and Terese is left feeling more isolated than ever.As Terese's colleagues all become convinced that she is losing the plot, Brad is determined to fight her corner. Terese misconstrues his support for something more and heads off to find him at the Turner house. © Channel 5Brad and Lauren get intimate However, once she arrives, Terese's new-found hope is quickly destroyed when she witnesses an intimate moment between Lauren and Brad as he admits that he was miserable in his marriage. Shattered and alone, Terese returns home to an empty house where she reflects on all that she has lost. Will she be able find a way to move forward without Brad? © Channel 5Terese overhears Brad and returns home Neighbours airs these scenes on Friday, October 23 at 1.45pm and 5.30pm on Channel 5.Read more Neighbours spoilers and newsOver on Home and Away, Leah Patterson-Baker will be left devastated after calling off her engagement to Zac MacGuire.The couple have been feeling the strain ever since it emerged that newcomer Hunter was Zac's estranged son, but their problems will reach a peak in episodes airing later this month.To add to the already-palpable tension, Charlotte and Hunter are going to extreme efforts to ensure that they get Zac all to themselves, leaving Leah to feel increasingly isolated. © Channel 5Leah and Zac decide to end their engagement However, the situation will reach breaking point when an upset Leah (Ada Nicodemou) witnesses a happy moment between Zac, Charlotte and Hunter on the pier. Unable to cope with the situation any longer, Leah later tells Zac back at home that as he is unable to choose between her and his son, she is making the decision for him.Leah then takes off her engagement ring and walks out, but is it really the end of the road for the pair? © Channel 5Zac holds Leah's engagement ring in his hand Home and Away airs these scenes on Wednesday, October 21 at 1.15pm and 6pm on Channel 5.Home and Away spoilers: Charlotte King to make a move on Zac MacGuireRead more Home and Away spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on Ben and Kathy's EastEnders reunion, Aaron's Emmerdale arrest, important news for Fiz and Tyrone in Coronation Street and a shock kidnapping in Hollyoaks. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4532176223001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14532176223001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4532176223001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4532176223001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14532176223001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4532176223001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
